title: If Itâ€™s Monday It Must Be Madurai: A Conducted Tour of India
description: A delightful travel book!This entertaining travelogue around ten conducted tours contains myriad riches: of hanging on to a camel in the Thar; rediscovering music on the trail of Kabir; joining an ancient pilgrimage; and hunting for sex in Tashkent.
author: Srinath Perur
